Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory79.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'West General', 3: "UUUUGGHH, how is it that you've defeated me, the West General?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'West General', 3: 'AAAAGGHHH!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He has not actually fought you, but the West General poses weirdly after Lucia has passed the trial to demonstrate his defeat.'}
{3: 'He buries his head inside his hands, then half-kneels on the floor before falling to the ground with a "Thud!" while groaning painfully.'}
{2: 'What a realistic performance.', 3: '4000', 4: "A little bit hyperbolic, isn't it?", 5: '4001'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "He does act like a defeated villain, doesn't he? But we really should focus on our surroundings right now, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "He should've fallen immediately. But we really should focus on our surroundings right now, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After Lucia points it out, you realize that the recon drones are also falling alongside the West General. With that, the holographic projections around you begin to crumble.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory84.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'What is this place?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What it was originally, I imagine. It looks to be a factory.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'With that, Lee walks toward the giant screen and opens the terminal with the black box he carries.'}
{2: 'What are you looking for?', 3: '15', 4: 'Is this a good idea?', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Just what this factory was built for. Maybe we can even figure out why so many mechanoids gather here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm certain there will be an order to investigate this place after this. We're going to save some time if we start preparing now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But isn't this place maintained by Foreman and the others?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm not digging for their secrets. I'm just trying to find out what this factory originally was.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Lee begins to decipher the factory's terminal afterward, and data soon appear on the screen."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Are these records of the factory?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Correct. It seems like this is an assembly line of a packaging plant—a medium-to-low-level one, judging by its scale.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Pay attention to this... notice of cessation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "There's a more detailed explanation underneath. Basically, all human employees were ordered to evacuate because of the Punishing Virus.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'That was par for the course back then.', 3: '24', 4: 'Just humans?', 5: '25'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Indeed. This kind of operation was happening everywhere back in those days, but the point is they only evacuated the human employees...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Indeed. To lessen the pressure on the operations and guarantee their efficiency, only humans were evacuated.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'So, Foreman and the others...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'There are no concrete proofs, but we can assume that they are the mechanoids that got left behind.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Although I'm not sure how they managed to avoid the Punishing Virus, they've somehow survived until now, and, following the schedule of the factory...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'They gather here to celebrate the festivals.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This is just a guess, of course. I simply noticed that days like the Double Seventh Festival and the Ghost Festival are marked on their calendar.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Even with the humans gone and the factory abandoned... they're still gathering here according to custom.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Following their routines is a fundamental part of their programming logic. There's nothing unusual for them to act like this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's about everything we can find out about this place. Let's focus on the last trial.", 4: '2'}
{2: "Let's get going.", 3: '35'}
